Elon Musk: As a tech entrepreneur and innovator, I would choose to swap places with Elon Musk. He is the CEO of SpaceX, Tesla, Neuralink, and The Boring Company, and has made significant contributions to various industries. Swapping places with him would allow me to work on groundbreaking projects and potentially contribute to advancements in technology, space exploration, and sustainable energy.

Angelina Jolie: As an accomplished actress and humanitarian, I would choose to swap places with Angelina Jolie. She is known for her work in Hollywood and her dedication to philanthropy and human rights causes. By swapping places with her, I would have the opportunity to work on film projects that make a positive impact and contribute to her humanitarian efforts.

Barack Obama: As the first African American President of the United States, I would choose to swap places with Barack Obama. He played a significant role in shaping history and promoting social justice. Swapping places with him would allow me to contribute to political discourse and work towards creating a more inclusive and equitable society.

Jeff Bezos: As the founder of Amazon and one of the wealthiest people in the world, I would choose to swap places with Jeff Bezos. He has revolutionized the way we shop and has invested in various industries, including space exploration. Swapping places with him would allow me to work on innovative projects and potentially contribute to his endeavors in creating a more sustainable future.

Bill Gates: As the co-founder of Microsoft and philanthropist, I would choose to swap places with Bill Gates. He has contributed significantly to the tech industry and has dedicated a significant portion of his wealth to philanthropy through the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation. Swapping places with him would allow me to work on projects that address global health and education challenges.
